DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate wether beetroot juice sodium nitrate enhances time trial performance Swiss paracycling athlete compare ingestion placebo supplement . Furthermore , effect beetroot juice sodium nitrate performance investigate spinal cord injure non-injured athlete .

The subject perform three trial receive another supplement trial : beetroot juice 6mmol nitrate , 6mmol sodium nitrate plain water ( placebo supplement ) . The time complete time trial main outcome parameter .
